Need help reading this?

computeSSE

src/kmeans.js

Calculates the sum of squared errors

computeSSE(data: Array<Array<Number>>, centers: Array<Array<Number>>, clusterID: Array<Number>): Number
Parameters
data (Array<Array<Number>>) the (x,y) points to cluster
centers (Array<Array<Number>>) the K centers in format (x,y)
clusterID (Array<Number>) the cluster identifier for each data dot
Returns
Number: the sum of squared errors

updateClusterID

src/kmeans.js

Updates the cluster identifier based in the new data

updateClusterID(data: Array<Array<Number>>, centers: Array<Array<Number>>): Array
Parameters
data (Array<Array<Number>>) the (x,y) points to cluster
centers (Array<Array<Number>>) the K centers in format (x,y)
Returns
Array: the cluster identifier for each data dot

updateCenters

src/kmeans.js

Update the center values based in the new configurations of the clusters

updateCenters(data: Array<Array<Number>>, clusterID: Array<Number>, K: Number): Array
Parameters
data (Array<Array<Number>>) the (x,y) points to cluster
clusterID (Array<Number>) the cluster identifier for each data dot
K (Number) Number of clusters
Returns
Array: he K centers in format (x,y)

kmeans

src/kmeans.js

K-means algorithm

kmeans(data: Array<Array<Number>>, centers: Array<Array<Number>>, options: Object): Object
Parameters
data (Array<Array<Number>>) the (x,y) points to cluster
centers (Array<Array<Number>>) the K centers in format (x,y)
options (Object) properties
Name Description
options.maxIterations Number maximum of iterations allowed
options.tolerance Number the error tolerance
options.withIterations boolean store clusters and centroids for each iteration
Returns
Object: the cluster identifier for each data dot and centroids
